news.title: Cambridge Dictionary adds over 6,000 new words including "skibidi" and "delulu"
news.summary: The nature of social media algorithms causes internet slang like "skibidi" and "delulu" to skyrocket in popularity and work their way into the English lexicon, linguists say.

news.title: Stewart Lee announces first Irish tour in 14 years
news.summary: His latest tour will hit venues across the country next year including dates in Dublin, Derry, Waterford and Cork.

news.title: Netflix announces release for House Of Guinness and shares first look images
news.summary: Arthur Guinness will be played by Belfast actor Anthony Boyle

news.title: Aoife Dunne - Mad Hatter Q&A: "There are so many artists that have marked different epochs of my life – and this time of my life is well and truly being marked by the incredible CMAT"
news.summary: Currently in the midst of her Good Grief tour, comedian Aoife Dunne answers our Mad Hatter questions...

news.title: BIIRD perform at Derry Girls star Saoirse-Monica Jackson's wedding
news.summary: "It was beyond a pleasure to play for yer special day," said BIIRD.
